SCOPE & STOP Hormones Analysis 29 August 2022 Overview This page contains analysis results for SCOPE and STOP Hormones. Absorbance Concentrations: Standard curves

1 Standard Curves This section contains standard curves fitted for Prolactin, HPL, and GH2. GH2 Plate 22 (28-2-22) omitted due to invalid standard curve. Inter-assay CV for Prolactin and HPL higher than recommended 15%. According to the protocols, the following methods were used for curve fitting: - Prolactin: Quadratic - HPL: 4-parameter Logistic - GH2: non-linear splines

2.1 Main data Read raw data files and compile data frame for analysis. ## Main data files main_dat <- read.csv(file.path(data_dir,"SCOPE_STOP_folate_data_20220812.csv"),header=T) #SCOPE+STOP data sel_dat <- read.csv(file.path(data_dir,"SCOPE+STOP_GDM_students_matched_Folate_VitD_20210907.csv")) #selected samples ## variable to indicate selected samples main_dat$Selected <- 0 main_dat$Selected[with(main_dat,Study%in%"SCOPE" & Study.ID%in%sel_dat$ID[sel_dat$Study%in%"SCOPE"])] <- 1 main_dat$Selected[with(main_dat,Study%in%"STOP" & Study.ID%in%sel_dat$ID[sel_dat$Study%in%"STOP"])] <- 1

2.2 Hormones data Data for GA at 12wks. # data for GA at 12wks w12_dat <- read.csv(file.path(data_dir,"12wk SCOPE serum_20220128.csv"),header=T) w12_dat$Timepoint <- "12wks" w12_dat$HPL.Assay <- as.numeric(as.character(w12_dat$HPL.Assay)) w12_dat$HPL.Sample.. <- as.numeric(as.character(w12_dat$HPL.Sample..)) w12_dat$Prolactin.Assay <- as.numeric(as.character(w12_dat$Prolactin.Assay)) w12_dat$Prolactin.Sample.. <- as.numeric(as.character(w12_dat$Prolactin.Sample..)) w12_dat$GH2.Assay <- as.numeric(as.character(w12_dat$GH2.Assay)) w12_dat$GH2.Sample.. <- as.numeric(as.character(w12_dat$GH2.Sample..)) #w12_dat <- w12_dat[,-11] #no GH2 #w12_dat$GH2.Assay <- NA #w12_dat$GH2.Sample.. <- NA # convert W+D into (wks) decimals w12_ga.ls <- strsplit(w12_dat$X12wk.visit.Gest,"\\+") w12_ga.ls[which(w12_dat$X12wk.visit.Gest%in%"")] <- NA w12_ga <- Reduce(rbind,w12_ga.ls) w12_ga.wks <- round(as.numeric(w12_ga[,1]) + (as.numeric(w12_ga[,2])/7),2) w12_ga.dat <- cbind(w12_dat,"GA_12w"=w12_ga.wks) Combine data for Prolactin, HPL and GH2. ## hormones data hormone_var <- c("Prolactin","HPL","GH2") hormone_file <- file.path(data_dir,c("SCOPE+STOP_Prolactin_absorbance_20220729.csv", "SCOPE+STOP_HPL_absorbance_20220728.csv", "SCOPE+STOP_GH2_absorbance_20220803.csv")) hormone_dat_ls <- lapply(1:length(hormone_var), function(x){ dat_tmp <- read.csv(hormone_file[x])[,1:9] names(dat_tmp)[9] <- hormone_var[x] #hormone label names(dat_tmp)[1] <- paste0("Assay.",hormone_var[x]) #Assay label # add Timepoint (Assay 18 & 19) dat_tmp$Num <- unlist(lapply(table(with(dat_tmp,get(paste0("Assay.",hormone_var[x])))),function(x) seq(1,x,by=1))) dat_tmp2 <- merge(dat_tmp, w12_ga.dat[,c("ID...s","Timepoint","GA_12w",paste0(hormone_var[x],".Sample.."),paste0(hormone_var[x],".Assay"))], by.y=c(paste0(hormone_var[x],".Sample.."),paste0(hormone_var[x],".Assay")), by.x=c("Num",paste0("Assay.",hormone_var[x])),all.x=T) dat_tmp2$Timepoint[is.na(dat_tmp2$Timepoint)] <- "15wks" return(dat_tmp2[,c(names(dat_tmp),"Timepoint","GA_12w","ID...s")])}) hormone_dat <- Reduce(function(x,y) merge(x,y[,c(1,2,4,9,10:12)],by=c("Sample.ID","Cohort","Timepoint"),all=T),hormone_dat_ls) # check matched ID are the same -> OK #hormone_dat[!is.na(hormone_dat$ID...s),c("Cohort","Sample.ID","ID...s","GA_12w.x","GA_12w.y")] hormone_dat2 <- hormone_dat[,c(1:5,10,14:15,18:19,12)] #remove unsued columns (for merging) - GA_12w.x complete #names(hormone_dat2)[c(4,6:10)] <- paste0(rep(c("Assay.",""),3),rep(c("Prolactin","HPL","GH2"),each=2)) #shorten var names ## Aanalysis data dat_run <- merge(main_dat,hormone_dat2,by.x=c("Study.ID","Study"),by.y=c("Sample.ID","Cohort"),all=T) # replace GA_samp for 12wks samples dat_run$GA_samp[dat_run$Timepoint%in%"12wks"] <- dat_run$GA_12w.x[dat_run$Timepoint%in%"12wks"] # Missing Timepoint -> assume 15wks samples dat_run$Timepoint[is.na(dat_run$Timepoint)] <- "15wks" ## Filter final cohort samples only dat_run$Cohort.sample <- with(dat_run,paste(Study,Study.ID,sep=".")) dat_run <- dat_run[dat_run$Cohort.sample%in%with(main_dat,paste(Study,Study.ID,sep=".")),] # check GA_samp summary #with(dat_run,tapply(GA_samp,Timepoint,summary)) Number of samples No Yes SCOPE 604 58 STOP 711 198 Check timepoints SCOPE STOP 12wks 33 0 15wks 1164 1300

2.3 Data labels Define variable labels. # outcomes outc_labels <- c("GDM vs non-GDM","SPTB vs non-SPTB","GHT vs non-GHT","PE vs non-PE","SGA vs non-SGA", "GDM vs Uncomplicated","SPTB vs Uncomplicated","GHT vs Uncomplicated","PE vs Uncomplicated","SGA vs Uncomplicted","PE(new) vs Uncomplicated","GH(new) vs Uncomplicated","PE(new) vs non-PE","GH(new) vs non-GH", "GDM only vs Uncomplicated","Uncomplicated") names(outc_labels) <- c("f39_gdm_new","f39_sptb","f39_gh","f39_pet","f39_sga","GDM_new","PTB","GH","PE","SGA","PE_new","GH_new","f39_pet_new","f39_gh_new","GDM_only","Uncomplicated") # hormone variables hormone_labels <- c("hPL (mg/l)","GH2 (pg/ml)","PRL (pg/ml)") names(hormone_labels) <- c("HPL","GH2","Prolactin") # other variables fvar_labels <- c("Serum folate concentration (nM)","B12 concentration (pM)","Active B12 concentration (pM)","Folate:B12 ratio","Folate:Active B12 ratio","Homocysteine concentration (\u03bcM)","CRP (mg/L)","Cholesterol (mmol/L)","Glucose (mmol/L)","HDL (mmol/L)","Triglyceride (mmol/L)","Maternal age (yrs)","Maternal BMI","SEI","Maternal BMI (category)","Baby sex","Waist (cm)","Smoking","Vitamin D","Haemoglobin (g/L)","Haematocrit (PCV)","Folic acid supplement (\u03bcg)","Folic acid supplement (\u03bcg)","MetS","UIC (ug/L)","GA (sampling)","Ethnicity","Caucasian","HCG","PAPP-A","Red cell folate (nmol/L)","VitD:Folate","Gestational age at birth (weeks)","Birthweight (g)") names(fvar_labels) <- c("Folate","B12","Active.B12","folate_B12","folate_Active.B12","Homocysteine","CRPL2_mg.L","CHOL2_mmol.L","GLUC3_mmol.L","HDLC4_mmol.L","TRIGL_mmol.L","f1_age","BMI","SEI","BMI_gp","fetal_sex","f11_waist","f10c_any_cig_1st_vst","VitD","Hb","hct","folate_supp","folate_cat","metab.C1","UIC..ug.L.","GA_samp","Ethnicity","Ethnicity_cauc","HCG","PAPP.A","rcfolate","VitD_Folate","GA_birth","Birthweight") dat_labels <- c(fvar_labels,hormone_labels,outc_labels)
